entries.meaning: (music, lutherie, bowmaking) An instance of re-hairing.
examples: I've heard he does excellent rehairs.

verbs.description: rehair (third-person singular simple present rehairs, present participle rehairing, simple past and past participle rehaired)

entries.meaning: (music, lutherie, bowmaking) To renew the hair of the bow of a bowed string instrument.
examples: Could you rehair my bow by tomorrow?
